headline: AIG Valuation Check After 14% Monthly Gain and 5-Year Shareholder Returns Doubling
summary: American International Group (AIG) has been quietly rewarding patient shareholders, with the stock climbing about 14% over the past month and more than doubling over 5 years, even as growth remains steady rather than explosive. See our latest analysis for American International Group. Zooming out, that 13.99% 1 month share price return adds to a solid year to date rise. A 5 year total shareholder return of 161.16% signals durable, improving sentiment as AIG steadily grows earnings. If AIG’s...
